name: Mirror World (HeeSoo1114)
description:
This game is a mystery adventure tsukuru genre game and Players can play the game by moving between the mirror world and the real world.

MirrorWorld  is a project created by the high school club GUI in 2022.

You can move by pressing the arrow keys and interact by pressing the space key. Press the Tab key to bring up the inventory window.

We would appreciate it if you play this game and give us some feedback.
